sentences.sContent: Tourists often get lost and stray into dangerous areas.
sentences.sCn: 旅游者们经常迷路走进一些危险区域。

sentences.sContent: ...people let their cattle stray on the area...

synos.tran: 迷路的；[动]离群的；偶遇的

phrases.pCn: 飞鸟集（泰戈尔著名诗集）
杂散电感；漏电感；分布电感
杂散辐射；杂散损射；漫辐射

remMethod.val: 停(stay)那里等我去接， 否则会迷路(stray)

words.tran: 迷路者；流浪者；不走正路的人

trans.tranCn: 走失，迷路；分心，走神；离题
trans.tranOther: to move away from the place you should be

trans.tranCn: 迷路的，走失的；孤立的，零星的
trans.tranOther: a stray animal, such as a dog or cat, is lost or has no home
an animal that is lost or has no home
